scripts.build:css: npm run sass && npx postcss src/**/*.css --use postcss-inline-svg autoprefixer -d build/ --no-map && npm run lint:css
scripts.dist:copy: rsync -a --exclude='.*' --exclude='/node_modules' --exclude='/src' --exclude='/vendor' --exclude='composer*' --exclude='*.lock' --exclude='package.json' ./ my-tiny-adjustment-kit/ && rsync -a ./vendor/autoload.php my-tiny-adjustment-kit/vendor/ && rsync -a ./vendor/composer my-tiny-adjustment-kit/vendor/
